title: Basic Usage
content:
The value of

v-model is the value of the value attribute of the currently selected tiny-option.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Multiple Choices
content: The multiple attribute is used to enable the multi-selection function. In this case, the value of v-model is an array of selected values. By default, the selected value is displayed as a tag.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Collapse Tag
content: When you select multiple values, you can set the collapse-tags attribute to combine the selected values into a text.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Set the tag type
content: Set the tag type through the tagType attribute
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Set the text box type
content: You can set input-box-type to underline.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Maximum number of options
content:
The

multiple-limit attribute specifies the maximum number of items that can be selected by the user during multiple selection. The default value is 0, which is not limited.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Big Data Virtual Scrolling
content: You can set the options in the options drop-down list box and set optimization to enable the big data virtual scrolling function. Virtual scrolling is not supported when using the label configuration option. In multi-choice mode, the maximum number of selected items multiple-limit is 20 by default. If a large number of selected items are selected, you are advised to enable collapse-tags to collapse the display.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Disabled
content: After the disabled property is set, the entire selector is unavailable.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Some options in the drop-down list box are disabled.
content:
This option is unavailable after the disabled attribute is set for the

tiny-options tag.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: By default, multiple options in the drop-down list are selected and disabled.
content: After the disabled attribute is set for the default selected tag, this option is disabled.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: medium
content: The size attribute defines the text box size. The options are medium, small, and mini. Use options to configure the Select data item. After using the data item, you do not need to configure tiny-option.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Group
content: uses tiny-option-group to group options. The label attribute is the group name. Use the disabled attribute to disable all options in the group.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Disable some options for grouping
content: Use tiny-option-group to group options and disable some grouping.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: change clear blur focus event
content:
Description of the

event

change: triggered when the selected value changes. The callback parameter is the current selected value. clear: triggered when the user clicks the clear button in the option mode. blur: triggered when the input loses the focus. focus:

is triggered when the input is focused
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: visible-change remove-tag event
content:
Event Description

visible-change: Triggered when the drop-down list box is displayed or hidden. The callback parameter is true if the drop-down list box is displayed or false if the drop-down list box is hidden. remove-tag: Triggered when the tag is removed in multi-select mode. The callback parameter is the removed tag value
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Searchable
content: The filterable property enables the search function. By default, Select finds all options for which the label property contains the entered value. If you want to use other search logic, you can pass in a filter-method. filter-method is a function. It is invoked when the input value changes. The parameter is the current input value.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: The search allows copying
content: In the search scenario, the content in the text box cannot be copied. You need to add the allow-copy attribute to copy the content. The allow-copy attribute defaults to false. When hovering the mouse over the text box, press and move the mouse to select the previous text. When you hover the cursor over the text box and click the left mouse button, the input content changes to placeholder, the content is cleared, and the input state is entered.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Create Item
content: The allow-create attribute allows you to create a new entry that does not exist in the option by entering text in the text box. Note that the filterable attribute must be true at this point. After the default-first-option attribute is set to true, you can press Enter to select the first option in the current option list. You do not need to use the mouse or keyboard arrow keys to locate the option.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Remote Search
content: To enable remote search, set filterable and remote to true. In addition, a remote-method is transferred. remote-method is a function. It is invoked when the input value changes. The parameter is the current input value. When the reserve-keyword attribute has multiple options and is searchable, the current search keyword can be retained after an option is selected.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

content: For details, see the following example.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Remote search allows replication
content: In the remote search scenario, the content in the text box cannot be copied. You need to add the allow-copy attribute to copy the content. The allow-copy attribute defaults to false. When hovering the mouse over the text box, press and move the mouse to select the previous text. When you hover the cursor over the text box and click the left mouse button, the input content changes to placeholder, the content is cleared, and the input state is entered.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Options can be cleared
content: You can use the clearable attribute to clear the selector. When you hover the cursor over the selector, the clear icon is displayed. Note that the clearable attribute applies only to single selection.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: name
content: You can set the name attribute through the name attribute
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Select selector options can be copied
content: After the tag-selectable attribute is set, the selected options in the text box can be selected by using the mouse, and then you can press Ctrl + C or right-click to copy the options.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: The Select selector option can be copied to all.
content: After the copyable attribute is set, all tag text contents can be copied and separated by commas.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Bound Value Object
content: If the bound value is an object, the value-key attribute must be configured to specify the key name uniquely identified by the value.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Customized search text without matching
content: You can use the no-match-text attribute to customize the text displayed when no search criteria are matched.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Customized text for empty data display
content:
You can use the no-data-text attribute to customize the text displayed when the option is empty.

You can set the show-empty-image attribute to display empty data images. By default, empty data images are not displayed.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Pop-up dialog box style and positioning
content: You can use the popper-class attribute to customize the style of the drop-down list box. popper-append-to-body Specifies whether to insert a pop-up into the body element. If a fault occurs in locating the dialog box that is displayed, set this parameter to false.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: The drop-down menu is displayed when the focus is obtained.
content: After automatic-dropdown is set to true, the option menu is automatically displayed after the focus is obtained in the text box.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Custom header content
content: Customize the header content of the text box through the prefix slot.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: User-defined drop-down list
content: is implemented through the default slot of Option. Insert the customized HTML template into the slot of tiny-option.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: The Select All option is not displayed.
content:
If

show-alloption is set to false, the Select All option is not displayed. The default value is true.

title: Manually obtaining the focus
content: Invoke the focus() method to focus the input.

title: The drop-down list follows the width of the text box.
content: The is-drop-inherit-width attribute is used to set whether the drop-down list box follows the width of the text box. The default value is false, indicating that the content is not followed. The width of the drop-down list can be expanded. If the value is true, the content is followed.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.

title: Empty data slot
content: Use empty to set the message displayed when there is no data.

title: Nested Grid data item disabled
content: In the drop-down list box, the attribute checkMethod of the select-config configuration item is used to determine which data items are disabled. The method determines each data item. If the return value is true or false, the data item is enabled or disabled. Select a single option from the drop-down list box. The attribute checkMethod of the radio-config configuration item is used to determine which data items are disabled. The method determines each data item. If the return value is true or false, the data item is enabled or disabled.
findIntroStr: Select selector is a UI component that displays and selects data from a drop-down list box.
